name: 1.17 "Diane's Perfect Date" Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm was an accountant but was often out of work. Part of why he couldn't hold a job was because he was always skipping out on work to go to Cheers.

questions.correct: Tell instantly the number of letters in any sentence
questions.explanation:
Tell instantly the number of letters in any sentence.

	Walter was Diane's date that evening and Diane started to find this habit of his to be really annoying. After Sam met the man he claimed he could set Diane up with a better date.

questions.text: When Diane said, "I resent that", how did Sam respond?
questions.explanation:
"Eleven".

	Sam was mimicking Walter and counted the letters in Diane's sentence. Diane was not amused by this.

questions.text: Who did Sam think his date was?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Sam believed that Diane had the hots for him and wanted to set herself up on a date with him. This was one of the first times we got a hint that there was some sort of spark between Sam and Diane.

Gretchen.

	Gretchen was played by Gretchen Corbett. She was on "Rockford Files" for the first four years.

questions.text: Where did Sam find Diane's date?
questions.explanation:
In the pool room.

	Sam thought Diane wanted to go out with him herself so he never got a date for Diane. When he found out Gretchen was his date, he went to the pool room to find a date for Diane.

questions.text: Who was Diane's date that Sam set her up with?
questions.explanation:
Andy.

	Andy was played by Derek McGrath. Sam paid Andy $20 to go out with Diane because he didn't have a date for her.

questions.text: What was Diane's date in prison for?
questions.explanation:
manslaughter.

	Sam didn't know that Andy was a murderer when he hired him to date Diane. Andy said he killed a waitress.

questions.text: What did Diane's date fantasize his hands were?
questions.explanation:
claws.

	Andy did ten years in prison and was slightly insane. When the four of them were sitting at Cheers, Andy asked them, "Did you ever dream your hands were claws?"

questions.text: Diane claimed Sam was carrying a torch for her. Did he admit this?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	He admitted it only to get her to admit it but he did admit it. This caused the rest of the Cheers regulars to discuss whether Sam carried a torch for Diane or Diane carried a torch for Sam.
